body_html:
@qmeeus I don't know if it is strictly related to the variable_scope handling.
In cases like #16468 (comment):
I am not using an explicit variable scope but seems that has some impact on TB grouping/rendering.
The runtime statistics on the Tensorboard tell that out_a and out_b has its own memory allocated and on the TB seems a duplicated allocation.

body:
@qmeeus I don't know if it is strictly related to the `variable_scope` handling. 
In cases like https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/16468#issuecomment-385662734:
 I am not using an explicit variable scope but seems that has some impact on TB grouping/rendering.
The runtime statistics on the Tensorboard tell that `out_a` and `out_b` has its own memory allocated and on the TB seems a duplicated allocation.
